DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to determine the main factors contributing to predicted 10 year cardiovascular risk in an HIV infected cohort, and the role of anti-HIV drug use in altering this risk
DOC.brief_title: Cardiovascular Risk Evaluation and Antiretrovirals in HIV
DOC.criteria: Serologically proven HIV infection Attending general HIV outpatient clinic Attending a specialist outpatient clinic which might lead to recruitment bias
